item.text: From the elder, to an elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth (and not I alone, but also all those who know the truth),

<st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st>.
Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
I rejoiced greatly because I have found some of your children living according to the truth, just as the Father commanded us.
But now I ask you, lady (not as if I were writing a new commandment to you, but the one we have had from the beginning), that we love one another.

(<st data-num="2532">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="26">love</st>: <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st>.) <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> you have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746">beginning</st>; <st data-num="2443" class="">thus</st><n id="2" /> you should <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4108" class="">deceivers</st> have <st data-num="1831">gone out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, people who do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3670" class="">confess</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> as<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3778">This person</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4108" class="">deceiver</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="500" class="">antichrist</st>!<n id="5" />
Watch out, so that you do not lose the things we have worked for, but receive a full reward.
Everyone who goes on ahead and does not remain in the teaching of Christ does not have God. The one who remains in this teaching has both the Father and the Son.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> your <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> any <st data-num="5463" class="">greeting</st><n id="1" />
because the person who gives him a greeting shares in his evil deeds.
Though I have many other things to write to you, I do not want to do so with paper and ink, but I hope to come visit you and speak face to face so that our joy may be complete.
The children of your elect sister greet you.
